description: This file defines core data models for a recipe application, including Ingredient, RecipeStep, and Recipe classes, which are used throughout the app to represent recipes, their ingredients, and preparation steps.

classes.name: Ingredient
classes.description: Represents an individual ingredient with a name and optional quantity for use in recipes.

classes.name: RecipeStep
classes.description: Represents a single step in the recipe instructions, including its order and description.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: The main recipe model containing id, title, description, image, cooking time, rating, tags, ingredients, and steps, used across the app.
